casebody.data:
Gilbert BREEDLOVE and Thomas Holland
v.
Marion R. WARREN, in his official capacity as Director of the N.C. Administrative Office of the Courts, and the North Carolina Administrative Office of the Courts. No. 7P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Elliot M. Engstrom, for Breedlove, Gilbert, et al. W. Ellis Boyle, for Breedlove, Gilbert, et al. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, for Warren, Marion R., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 6th of January 2016 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
